reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Trailblazer program is a youth social innovation and Entrepreneurship program.It is the organisation's flagship program and was established in 2009 with the goal of empowering young peolpe with theoretical and practical training to enable them to engage wi th and solve issues of inequality disconnection and apathy.Through this program high school students are inspired trained and supported to lead meaningful social change in their communities.There are 3 major components of the program training action and su pport and celebration.This program will be implemented in a new city Bloemfointein Free state .Direct beneficiaries 165 learners will benefit from this programe over a period of 18 months. expected results are broken into 3 main areas mapping onto Enke's m ission (to connect Equip and inspire).Enke aims to assess long term changes in the social capital of the youth that participate in its programs in comparison to a control group results will be published in September 2015 they also aim to increase an indivi dual sense of self efficacy social responsibility and ability to innovate this is measured through participants initiation and completion of acommunity Action Project and how many people are impacted by these projects.
